H0.text: where is the tibia and fibula bone located. Arm

H1.text: where is the tibia and fibula bone located. Pelvis

H2.text: where is the tibia and fibula bone located. Foot

H3.text: where is the tibia and fibula bone located. leg

A4.text: The tibia is found on the medial side of the leg next to the fibula and closer to the median plane.

A5.text: The tibia is the larger, stronger, and anterior (frontal) of the two bones in the leg below the knee in vertebrates (the other being the fibula, behind and to the outside of the tibia);
